# size

**Instance Property**

The total amount of memory, in bytes, for the heaps you create with this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
var size: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can use various [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] methods to help you estimate an appropriate heap size, including the following:

- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/heapBufferSizeAndAlign(length:options:)]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/heapTextureSizeAndAlign(descriptor:)]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/heapAccelerationStructureSizeAndAlign(size:)]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/heapAccelerationStructureSizeAndAlign(descriptor:)]



This property’s default value is `0`.

## Configuring a heap

- **type**: The memory placement strategy for any resources you allocate from the heaps you create with this descriptor.
- **storageMode**: The storage mode for the heaps you create with this descriptor.
- **cpuCacheMode**: The CPU cache behavior for any resources you allocate from the heaps you create with this descriptor.
- **hazardTrackingMode**: The hazard tracking behavior for any resources you allocate from the heaps you create with this descriptor.
- **resourceOptions**: The combined behavior for any resources you allocate from the heaps you create with this descriptor.
- **sparsePageSize**: The page size for any resources you allocate from the heaps you create with this descriptor.
